commit.message:
Rollup merge of #62772 - estebank:trait-bound, r=matthewjasper

Suggest trait bound on type parameter when it is unconstrained

Given

```
trait Foo { fn method(&self) {} }

fn call_method<T>(x: &T) {
    x.method()
}
```

suggest constraining `T` with `Foo`.

Fix #21673, fix #41030.
